log_repeat_prompt: Do you want to log more work?
upload_prompt: Can you upload a file with the work logs?
upload_prompt_retry: You have to upload a file. Try again!
cancel_conversation: Maybe it's not the right time for this. Let's try again later!
upload_multiple: Sorry, I can only handle one file at a time. Try again!
upload_unknown: Sorry, I only know how to read plain text files. Try again!
